tasks.build: deno task clean && deno task build-common && deno task build-all-dockers
tasks.build-all: deno task build && deno task build-examples
tasks.bundle-all: bash -c 'ls -1 src/modules | xargs -I {} deno bundle src/modules/{} -- build/{}.bundle'
tasks.build-common: cd docker ; DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker build -t pipe-webserver/build -f Dockerfile.build ..
tasks.list-all-dockers:
echo 'vim
puppeteer
golang-builder
magikarp
magikarp.dev
nginx'
tasks.build-all-dockers: bash -c 'cd docker && deno task list-all-dockers | DOCKER_BUILDKIT=0 xargs -I {} docker build -t pipe-webserver/{} -f Dockerfile.{} ..'
tasks.build-packer: cd docker ; DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 DOCKER_SCAN_SUGGEST=false docker build -t pipe-webserver/packer.macosx64 -f Dockerfile.packer.macosx64 ..
tasks.list-examples:
echo 'example1
example2
example3
example5
example6
example7
example8
example9
example10'
tasks.build-examples: bash -c 'cd docker ; deno task list-examples | xargs -I {} docker build -t pipe-webserver/{} -f Dockerfile.{} ..'
